sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Home Depot topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.7%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 12.4% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Travelers Companies, trading down 3.1%.
Travelers Companies is showing a gain of 0.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 0.6%, and Pfizer, trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
